import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Nav}from"./components/Nav/Nav";import{Members}from"./components/Members/Members";import{Header}from"./components/Header/Header";import{CurrentBook}from"./components/CurrentBook/CurrentBook";import{Archive}from"./components/Archive/Archive";import{useRef}from"react";import{serverUrl}from"./Constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
const archiveRef=useRef(null);const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[members,setMembers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://".concat(serverUrl,"/data/books")).then(response=>response.json()).then(jsonData=>setBooks(jsonData)).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching JSON:",error));},[]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://".concat(serverUrl,"/data/members")).then(response=>response.json()).then(jsonData=>setMembers(jsonData)).catch(error=>console.error("Error fetching JSON:",error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{archiveRef:archiveRef,members:members,className:"nav-el"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{className:"header-el"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CurrentBook,{className:"current-book-el",books:books}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Members,{className:"member-el",members:members}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Archive,{ref:archiveRef,className:"archvive-el",books:books})]});}
